response.explain: The previous action code successfully grasped the oyster from the fridge. The next step is to move the robot to the stove.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the oyster from the fridge.
(4) Move the robot to the stove.
(5) Put the oyster on the stove.
(6) Cook the oyster.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
